item.title: How to Edit the Focus Sessions Timer in the Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Start a Focus Session: With Click With Windows 11 Settings How to Pause a Focus Session How to Resume a Focus Session How to Reset a Focus Session How to Show Time Remaining No time to scroll down? Click through these presentation slides: Watch a tutorial video: How to Start a Focus Session With Click Step 1: First switch to Focus Sessions mode. Click the “Start focus session” button.
